src:
2 Penalti dan 2 Kartu Merah, Ajax Amsterdam Merasa Dirampok
06 Nov 2019, 11:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Laga Chlesea vs Ajax Amsterdam di matchday keempat Grup H Liga Champions pada Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB berjalan seru. Pada laga di Stamford Bridge, tercipta delapan gol dengan skor akhir 4-4.
Meskipun tampil sebagai tim tamu, Ajax bermain agresif. Tim arahan Erik ten Hag bahkan unggul dengan skor 1-3 di babak pertama. Gol Ajax dicetak Tammy Abraham [bunuh diri], Quincy Promes, dan Kepa [bunuh diri].
Di babak kedua, Ajax menambah keunggulan. Gelandang Donny van de Beek mencetak gol pada menit ke-55. Ajax unggul 1-4. Setelah itu, Chelsea memperkecil kedudukan pada menit ke-63 lewat gol Cesar Azpilicueta.
Setelah itu, malapetaka untuk Ajax datang. Kartu merah beruntun didapat Ajax. Deley Blind dan Jan Veltman harus keluar lapangan. Bukan hanya itu, Ajax juga dihukum penalti yang diselesaikan dengan baik oleh Jorginho.
text:
2 Penalties and 2 Red Cards, Ajax Amsterdam Feeling Robbed
Nov 6 2019, 11:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chlesea vs Ajax Amsterdam matchday four in Champions League Group H on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hW exciting. In the match at Stamford Bridge, created eight goals with a final score of 4-4.
Despite appearing as a guest team, Ajax played aggressively. Erik ten Hag's landing team even won 1-3 in the first round. Ajax scored by Tammy Abraham [suicide], Quincy Promes, and Kepa [suicide].
In the second half, Ajax added advantage. Midfielder Donny van de Beek scored in the 55th minute. Ajax is superior 1-4. After that, Chelsea reduced their position in the 63rd minute through Cesar Azpilicueta's goal.
After that, havoc for Ajax came. Ajax's red card in a row. Deley Blind and Jan Veltman must leave the field. Not only that, Ajax was also sentenced to a penalty that was completed well by Jorginho.
